name: Cradle (BAAI-Agents)
description: [项目级] The Cradle framework is a first attempt at General Computer Control (GCC). Cradle supports agents to ace any computer task by enabling strong reasoning abilities, self-improvment, and skill curation, in a standardized general environment with minimal requirements.。来源: https://github.com/BAAI-Agents/Cradle

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
The Cradle framework is a first attempt at General Computer Control (GCC). Cradle supports agents to ace any computer task by enabling strong reasoning abilities, self-improvment, and skill curation, in a standardized general environment with minimal requirements.

来源: https://github.com/BAAI-Agents/Cradle
语言: Python
Stars: 2452

name: Cradle/cradle 模块
description: [模块级] Cradle 项目的 cradle 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/BAAI-Agents/Cradle

genes.title: cradle 模块说明
genes.content:
[[Website]](https://baai-agents.github.io/Cradle/) [[arXiv]](https://arxiv.org/abs/2403.03186) [[PDF]](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2403.03186) [![Python Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-3.10-blue.svg)]() [![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/badge/MIT-blue)]() ![](docs/images/cradle-intro-cr.png)
The Cradle framework empowers nascent foundation models to perform complex computer tasks via the same unified interface humans use, i.e., screenshots as input
